extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2024-55591 or CVE-2023-37936 by retrieving the installed FortiOS, FortiProxy, or FortiSwitch version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2024-55591?

extracted_playbook.title: Update FortiOS or FortiProxy
extracted_playbook.description: Update FortiOS to a version higher than 7.0.16 or FortiProxy to a version higher than 7.0.19 or 7.2.12 to mitigate CVE-2024-55591.

extracted_playbook.title: Search for Indicators of Compromise (IoCs)
extracted_playbook.description: Look for IoCs in logs and device configurations to detect potential exploitation of CVE-2024-55591.

extracted_playbook.title: Trigger Incident Response Process
extracted_playbook.description: Initiate the Incident Response process if IoCs are found, indicating potential exploitation of CVE-2024-55591.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2023-37936?

extracted_playbook.title: Update FortiSwitch
extracted_playbook.description: Update FortiSwitch to a version higher than 7.4.0 to mitigate CVE-2023-37936.
